sentences.sentence: Mr Suharto’s former backers in the West regretted praising him so effusively.
sentences.translation: 那些Suharto的西方支持者以前对他赞誉有加，现在则后悔不迭。

sentences.sentence: They were clueless as to what this effusively friendly display by the American couple was all about.
sentences.translation: 她们搞不懂，这对美国夫妇为什么如此热情地向她们示好。
